citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:14pm, on 06-JUN-
22.
This inspector was able to contact the facility representative via telephone, but no-one was physically present at the
facility. The inspectors waited approximately an additional 30 minutes; inspectors left the property at 3:45pm. Optimal
hours for future inspections are to be discussed and re-established.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:14pm, on 06-JUN-
22. 
 
This inspector was able to contact the facility representative via telephone, but no-one was physically present at the 
facility.  The inspectors waited approximately an additional 30 minutes; inspectors left the property at 3:45pm.  Optimal 
hours for future inspections are to be discussed and re-established. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section
